page.title: 09My Street in Harpenden
page.content:
My street is well kept and tidy. The houses are different sizes some fat, some thin and some standing together for company. My street is a green street, a colourful street, the houses are bright and the gardens are pretty and have trees in them. Old people live in my street young people too. Children play in their gardens making lots of noise. My street is a long, busy street, dads with brief cases walk down it to the station every morning. My street is safe in the middle of the day and quiet but its dangerous in the morning and the evening because of the traffic. My street is a friendly street because everyone has time to say hello and is pleasant to you.
My street is the best!
